altTitles.ja: ナニワトモアレ

altTitles.vi: Dù thế nào đi nữa / đó là tình bạn Naniwa

description.en: Guruguru Osaka, crackling ring! Now, the piston in my crotch is tingling!! I like picking up girls more than having three meals. Naniwa's youthful pleasure of being popular and having sex. I'm not a fart with a big loan either. I want to buy a new Silvia. I don't have the skill (technique), but I can't give up on my lewd spirit. An 18-year-old boy is making his ring debut!!

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.ja: 火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
description.vi:
Truyện kể về thời kỳ Tam quốc tranh bá nổi tiếng trong lịch sử Trung Quốc. Điểm đặc biệt ở đây là nhân vật trung tâm của truyện không phải là Tào Tháo, Lưu Bị hay Tôn Quyền như ta thường thấy ở các bộ truyện nói về thời kì này mà là Tư Mã Ý - người mà sau này đã cùng với gia tộc mình đánh bại tất cả các anh hùng khác, gom thiên hạ về thành 1 mối, chấm dứt 1 thời kỳ dài loạn lạc. 

Truyện mở đầu bằng cơn ác mộng mà Tư Mã Ý vẫn thường gặp: 1 người đàn ông trên ngai vàng phế truất ngôi vị của hoàng đế, bên ngoài bất chấp đám đông binh lính bao vây tấn công cùng bao nhiêu thương tích mà 1 người bình thường không thể chịu đựng nổi, tên tù vượt ngục vẫn bước từng bước từng bước một vào điện đòi món nợ máu với người đàn ông đó. Đó chỉ là cơn ác mộng hay là 1 điềm báo? Không ai nói được kể cả Tư Mã Ý.

Nhưng cũng có ai có thời gian để quan tâm đến truyện ấy trong thời loạn lạc này chứ. Dù cố né tránh, cuối cùng dòng họ Tư Mã cũng phải bước vào vòng xoáy chiến tranh, và sự xuất hiện của họ đã làm thay đổi cả dòng lịch sử....

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.ja: あかねまつり

description.en:
They are friends but not just friends.
This is a 4-koma manga about high school girls who just live their daily lives.

Akane: Short bob with black hair. She lives to enjoy life.
Matsuri: Cool blonde hair, serious at heart.
Azuki: Cute and petite dark girl.
Momiji: A sensible person who always quietly watches over everyone.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

description.en: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline. Go read the main story [here](https://mangadex.org/title/151bca3e-db98-4ad2-8d8d-239943b91437/you-shou-yan).

From Tokyopop:  
Transylvania Rose is a bored angel who descends to Earth to clean a few souls. When she witnesses a depressed undertaker slitting his wrists, Rose rips off one of her wings and gives it to the undertaker, trapping them both somewhere between heaven and hell–and life and death!

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

altTitles.ja: 悪女矯正計画

description.en:
"Hey, Seraphina. Even when you grow up, don’t end up killing me, okay?"

The wizard Arvel meets his end at the hands of his former fiancée, Seraphina, who later became the emperor’s mistress and a notorious villainess. However, when he comes to, he finds himself face-to-face with a young Seraphina! Astonishingly, he has returned to being his 13-year-old self. Seeing Seraphina before she became a villainess, Arvel makes a resolution: he will raise her to become a proper person and save his own life.

To start, he begins searching for a way to prevent the death of his brother, Sho, who was once engaged to Seraphina. However, the situation is far from simple, as he must contend with Seraphina’s neglectful family, men vying for the beautiful Seraphina’s attention, and a web of conflicting intentions.

In this journey through time, can Arvel alter Seraphina’s fate and save her from becoming a villainess…!?

title.en: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka Gaiden - Sword Oratoria

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか 外伝 ソード・オラトリア

altTitles.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? On the Side: Sword Oratoria

altTitles.ko: 던전에 만나기를 원하는 것은 잘못 일까 외전 소드 오라토리아 소드 오라토리아

altTitles.fr: DanMachi - Sword Oratoria : l'épopée d'une épéiste

altTitles.ru: Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье - Оратория Меча

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.

Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.
___
**Links:**
[Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/is-it-wrong-to-try-to-pick-up-girls-in-a-dungeon-on-the-side-sword-oratoria-manga)
description.ja: アイズ･ヴァレンシュタインは＜剣姫＞として名高く、第一級冒険者の中でも最強の一角といわれている。そんなアイズでも、まだまだ強くなりたいと思っている様子…？　果たしてそれはなぜ…？
description.ru: Спин-офф ранобэ "Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье", который охватывает историю одной из сильнейших авантюристок по имени Аиз Валленштайн, также известной, как "Принцесса Меча".

La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

altTitles.ja: カードキャプターさくら クリアカード編

altTitles.vi: Card Captor Sakura - Thẻ bài pha lê

description.en: It is spring, with cherry trees in full blossom, and Sakura is just entering middle school. Her beloved Syaoran has returned from Hong Kong, and life couldn't be better. But when she awakens from a strange dream to find her Sakura Cards powerless, how can she protect Tomoeda from disaster?! [Kodansha]
description.ru: Сакура уже учится в первом классе средней школы! Наша героиня продолжает жить своей обычной жизнью. Магическими картами нет пользоваться нужды. Все хорошо и никаких больше беспокойств не происходит. И даже более того! Сакура наконец-то смогла увидеться с Шаораном! Он возвратился, и теперь будет учиться вместе с нашей героиней в одной школе! Радости нет предела. Но что за странный сон ни с того ни с сего вдруг видит Сакура? Почему карты стали прозрачными? Почему странные события вновь начали происходить? И что они означают?
description.pt-br: O mangá ocorre após a graduação de Sakura na Escola Elementar Tomoeda, em seu primeiro ano de escola secundária. Sakura tem um misterioso sonho, e um incidente ocorre.

altTitles.th: ผู้ชนะรักนี้ต้องเป็นฉัน

description.en: Although Captain is handsome, kind, and good at sports, he’s also an avid gamer. That’s the reason why Kiss decided to start learning how to play games in hopes of winning over the senior she has a crush on. However, this turned out to be the beginning of an unexpected online relationship between Kiss and Miguel, who is secretly the world's number one pro player!

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke Is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

altTitles.es: El asesino que retornó como el hijo del Duque
El pibe que retorna como el hijo menor

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

altTitles.th: ลูกชายคนเล็กของดยุกคือมือสังหาร

altTitles.ja: 回帰した公爵家の末息子は暗殺者

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

altTitles.ja: Homura-sensei wa Tabun Motenai
ほむら先生はたぶんモテない
Homura Sensei ha Tabun Motenai

altTitles.vi: Homura Sensei hình như không có số đào hoa

description.en:
High-school student Hasumi-chan is drawn to Homura-sensei, a young, socially awkward biology teacher generally seen as weak and boring but recognized by her to be kind.   


---
description.fr: Hasumi-chan, une lycéenne, est attirée par Homura-sensei, un jeune professeur de biologie socialement maladroit, généralement considéré comme faible et ennuyeux mais reconnu par elle comme étant gentil.
description.ru:
Молодой учитель биологии Хомура всегда ходит в белом халате и выглядит очень скучным и слабым, а так же имеет страх к нынешним школьницам, но Хасуми всегда пытается следовать за учителем, ведь тот добрый и симпатичный.  


---

description.en: A series of stories illustrating classic Chinese poems.

altTitles.ja: グランドレス
隻眼の狙撃兵

description.en:
The Civil War continues to wage on the island nation of Alistria.

The Waldrons lead a small arms shop on this island when they receive a large rifle order from the army. 
However, this turns out to be a ploy by the colonel who made the order. 
He uses his ties to the rebel army to have them ransack the shop.

Having her husband killed, her daughter taken away and her own left eye lost, 
Sophia Waldron decides to take the only remaining sniper rifle and sets out for revenge!

title.en: My Empress Apprentice is Becoming Evil

altTitles.en: Fantasy: My Apprentice is Going to Become Dark

description.en: This book will never abuse the protagonist, the system is just a tool. Travel through the fantasy world! Become the master of the empress before she turned evil. The little apprentice who was abused in every way suddenly found that her master became gentle and powerful, and became more and more hard-mouthed and soft-hearted towards her... Su Changge: Damn system, I don’t want to be a scumbag villain! System: Born as a scumbag, destined to be a villain! Feng Wanqing: What should I do if I like my own master? I want to have a sweet love affair with my master, and my master can only...

title.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

description.en:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう話

altTitles.en: A Story About A Hallucinatory Girl Following Me Around

altTitles.vi: Cô gái trong ảo giác của tôi

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう ハミタの読み切り

altTitles.ja-ro: Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou - Hamita no Yomikiri

altTitles.en: A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around - Hamita Oneshots

altTitles.cs: Příběh o halucinózní holce co se za mnou slídí

description.en:
A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination.

---

Note: The original web comic that was released on on Twitter and Pixiv has been compiled on Amazon into 1 ebook volume titled Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou (幻覚少女がつきまとう) "A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around" and released on March 25, 2024.

* Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116706658)

After—something—changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.
description.ja: 心機一転を求めて、生まれ育ったハルバル町から引っ越すことになったひきこもりの少年・サニー。町を発つ3日前、幼なじみのケルに誘われて4年ぶりに家を出ると、以前とすっかり変わってしまった、かつての親友たちと再会する…。
description.uk: Після того, як—щось—змінилося в його житті чотири роки тому, Санні не виходив з дому навіть раз, живучі у своїй одинокій бульбашці. Сподіваючись на свіжий старт для свого сина, його мати вирішує вивезти родину з міста. Однак, коли його друг дитинства, Кел, повертається в його життя, Санні знову опиняється у світі, який він колись знав. Маючи тільки три дні до переїзду, хлопаки зустрічають знайомі обличчя, проходячи містом і пробуджуючи темні спогади, які Санні так сильно хотів забути.

altTitles.ja: トウキョ★ウォーズ
レイド・オン・トーキョー

description.en:
A "what-if" alternate history in which the Japanese Self-Defense Forces (JSDF) 
fight a desperate struggle against the Soviet Union after it launches 
a surprise invasion on Japan during heightened Cold War tensions.


*This is the original story ("Tokyo Wars") as published in 1991, 
not the 2008 re-release under the name "Raid on Tokyo", 
though there are few differences to note other than the title.

title.en: Strike Witches: Official Comic à la Carte

altTitles.ja: ストライクウィッチーズ 公式コミックアラカルト

altTitles.ja-ro: Strike Witches Koushiki Comic à la Carte

title.en: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon: Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚　～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.en: The Hero and the Sage, Reincarnated and Engaged
The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple

altTitles.pt-br: Reencarnado • O herói se casa com o sábio ~Depois de ficar noivo de um ex-rival, nos tornamos o casal mais forte~

description.en:
In a world ravaged by war and conflict, Hero Raid Freeden and Sage Eluria Caldwin clashed time and time again over fifty long years as the strongest soldiers of their respective nations. However, their long-standing rivalry came to an inevitable yet bitter end with Eluria’s sudden death. A thousand years later, Raid finds he has been reincarnated—and so has Eluria! The world may now be at peace, but the two have an unsettled rivalry between them and the mystery of their reincarnation looms ominously over their heads. There’s so much that needs to be done, so they decide to...get engaged and attend the Royal Institute of Magic together?!

---
**Links** 

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-hero-and-the-sage-reincarnated-and-engaged)
* [NovelUpdates](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/reincarnated-%e2%80%a2-the-hero-marries-the-sage-after-becoming-engaged-to-a-former-rival-we-became-the-strongest-couple/) (Temporary, Bug cuts this url when saved in the NU field)
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?
description.pt-br:
Reid, um jovem herói com a maior força física, e Elria, uma bela sábia com a maior habilidade mágica.

Eles continuaram a lutar como rivais em nações inimigas opostas, mas seu relacionamento chegou ao fim com a morte repentina de Elria... Então, mil anos depois,

Reencarnou em um mundo onde a magia reina suprema, mas aquele que manteve a força física mais forte de sua vida anterior, Reid, se reuniu com Elria, que também reencarnou—

"Ei, Reid, quero que você se case comigo."

"…Huh?"

Os dois, que se tornaram o casal amoroso inconsciente mais forte em mil anos, matricularam-se na Royal Magic Academy para decidir quem é mais forte!

altTitles.ja: まりんこゆみ

description.en:
Nagumo Yumi is an airhead high school girl, whose post-graduation plan is to go to the US and become president. 
To her high school friends' amazement, she actually manages to make it to the US during summer vacation. 
After befriending some elderly veterans, she becomes convinced that joining the Marine Corps is the best way 
to move her dream forward. The waitress Linda Crawford joins her to sign up at the recruitment center, 
and she also makes friends among the new recruits, Rita Fernandez and Donna King. 
Will they have what it takes to become a Marine?

"I only shine under your lens."

[Silent Yet Passionate X Luring]

Nan Mo, the top photographer in the country, having captured numerous internet celebrities and stars, still finds Jiang Yudai as her one and only obsession in her midnight dreams. Jiang Yudai became Grand Slam actress at the age of 18, and a decade later, she remains at the peak of popularity. She possesses an alluring, distant gaze and an untouchable, ethereal beauty. No one knows that behind the scenes, Jiang Yudai, under an online persona, she frequently expresses her love on Nan Mo's account, yearning for Nan Mo's lens to touch every inch of her body.

altTitles.ja: 終末のマリステラ

description.en:
In the future, humanity has been all but destroyed, only a small portion remains alive. 
Using the wisdom of older times, a group of winged girls, called angels, 
is created and is entrusted with the future of humanity.

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%B5%82%E6%9C%AB%E3%81%AE%E3%83%9E%E3%83%AA%E3%82%B9%E3%83%86%E3%83%A9)

title.en: Intai Maou wa Yuuyuujiteki ni Kurashitai

altTitles.ja: 引退魔王は悠々自適に暮らしたい　※女勇者「許さない…絶対にだ！」

description.en: The "former strongest Demon King" Sigurd has retired! Now, he's living a relaxing slow life in the countryside, hiding his identity. But then, an "absolutely unforgiving" female hero, Rita, arrives!! In the peaceful and gentle village surrounded by nature, they find themselves being chased for their lives, sleeping in the same bed, and fighting together...!?
description.ja:
元・最強魔王のスローライフにやってきたのは“絶対に許さない”女勇者!?

無敵の魔王・シグルズが引退した!! 彼は現在、正体を隠して辺境でのんびりスローライフを満喫中。そんな彼の元にやってきたのは“絶対に許さない”女勇者・リタ――!! 平和でやさしい大自然の村の中、命を狙って追いかけられたり、同じベッドで眠ったり、協力して戦ったり…!?

title.en: Welcome to FACT! (Tokyo S-Ward Branch Two)

altTitles.ja: ようこそ！FACT（東京S区第二支部）へ

description.en:
Love and intrigue intertwined, brought to life by Uoto, the creator of *Orb: On the Movements of the Earth*.

Watanabe works as a temporary worker in a frozen meat loading and unloading operation. The only words he can muster are "Nice to meet you" and "Thank you for your hard work." Living a monotonous life guided by logical thinking, he one day finds himself immersed in the world of "love" and "conspiracy theories." In this story that shakes the very concept of what is right, you might find yourself dragged into the quagmire of conspiracy theories if you dive too deep!

A groundbreaking and unprecedented romantic comedy story by Uoto, the author of 'Orb.' and '100M.'
What is White Day? This quick one-shot will tell you what this special holiday is all about.
description.pl: Czym jest "Biały Dzień"? Ten krótki one-shot powie Ci co nieco o tym specjalnym święcie.

title.en: Net no "Oshi" to Real no "Oshi" ga Tonari ni Hikkoshite Kita

altTitles.ja: ネットの『推し』とリアルの『推し』が隣に引っ越してきた

altTitles.en: My Fave Persons Moved into Condominium Where I Live

description.en:
**The only one who can support them is... me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols." His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber. His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress. Souma's university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols... But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!? Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol...
description.ja: 無為な日々を過ごす天童蒼馬には二人の『推し』がいる。ネットの『推し』大人気VTuberのアンリエッタ。リアルの『推し』アイドル声優の八住ひより。二人への推し活を生きがいに大学生活を送るはずが……なんと隣の部屋に『推し』の一人が引っ越してきて!?夢のような展開に胸を躍らせる蒼馬だったが、目の当たりにしたのは残念すぎる『推し』の本性で――。
description.vi: Vtuber nhà rác... Seiyuu Idol bợm rượu... Bạn thuở nhỏ Yandere... Ai sẽ là người chiến thắng

title.en: GIRLS und PANZER - Momi no Ki to Tetsu no Hane no Majo

altTitles.en: GIRLS und PANZER - The Fir Tree and the Iron-Winged Witch

altTitles.ja: ガールズ＆パンツァー樅の木と鉄の羽の魔女

description.en: The manga centers around Noemi Kohiyama, a second-year student at Count High School, a school with no established reputation in the world of tankery. Her first match as a tank commander is against Saunders University High School. She directs the crew of her tank with her orders, and she follows the orders of their team leader. At that time, she remembers the words that her senior said to her.

Tang Ran is a bright and cheerful little fox spirit. To graduate from the Monster Academy, she transforms into a human college student hoping to seduce a human and make them fall in love with her. However, little does she know that the reserved human female professor she has a crush on, Su Qingci, is actually a…

One lie leads to another. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox must spin an endless web of “lies.”

title.en: Neet Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: ニートくノ一となぜか同棲はじめました

altTitles.en: Somehow, I started Living with a NEET Kunoichi

description.en:
Otaku Kunoichi ≒ Otaku NEET ≒ Girl with Zero Romantic Experience!

A normal salaryman, Tsukasa, is attacked by a Youma and is gallantly saved by the appearance of the genius kunoichi, Shizuri. However, when she is not working, she becomes an otaku NEET... Today, Tsukasa's househusband skills will continue to spoil Shizuri. A prescription delivered directly to you♪

The Comic Walker version of "NEET de Otaku na Kunoichi to naze ka Dousei hajimemashita". The story is almost 1 to 1 with the doujinshi excluding chapter 1.

With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

altTitles.ja: アスラの沙汰

description.en: "Only do good deeds."—Asura follows his late mother's teachings and always strives to do good in life. No matter how much he is bullied, he goes on with a smile, firmly believing that evildoers will receive divine punishment. Until one day, an ominous old man offers him a key that can open the doors to hell...
description.pt-br: "Faça apenas boas ações". — Asura segue os ensinamentos de sua falecida mãe e sempre se esforça para fazer o bem. Não importa o quanto seja zoado, continua com um sorriso, acreditando firmemente que os malfeitores receberão uma punição divina. Até que, certo dia, um velho agourento lhe oferece uma chave que pode abrir os Portões do Inferno...

title.en: 30-sai made Doutei de Itara Mahou Shoujo ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 30歳まで童貞でいたら魔法少女になりました

altTitles.en: I Was a Virgin Until I Was 30 so I Was Turned Into a Magical Girl

description.en:
"When you are a virgin until you are 30, you will become a wizard." A famous joke around the Internet… is what I thought, but to think that it actually happened to me!

Wait, but this isn't a wizard? Eh? Magical girl? Why?

Comedy manga about magical girls who used to be old virgin guys!

---

[Alternative Niconico raws](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39350)

altTitles.ja: 不運からの最強男

description.en:
After having lived a life full of misfortune, Siegbert has been reincarnated as a result of an accident. His new family is so warm. He can't believe he was unlucky in his previous life.  

He thought he would live a peaceful life this time, but unfortunately, his luck level is abnormally high and his luckiness attracts "chance" and can make whatever his wish come true if he can tackle these "chances". However, these "chances" comes with a price, Siegbert and those around him has to face formidable enemies and a life-or-death situation.  

Siegbert is determined to beat all of the odds with his abnormally high magic power and appraisal eye that he got after reincarnating to protect those around him.
description.id:
Siegbert yang selalu tertimpa kemalangan di kehidupan sebelumnya, sekarang ia tereinkarnasi ke dunia lain.
Ia tidak mengira keluarga barunya merupakan keluarga yang hangat karena kemalangan yang ia hadapi di kehidupan sebelumnya.
Akan tetapi, apakah ia akan tetap dihujani oleh kemalangan bahkan setelah tereinkarnasi?

altTitles.ja: からくりサーカス

description.en:
Katou Narumi (19) suffers from Zonapha Syndrome, a rare ailment that stops his breathing unless he makes people laugh. He's been forced to abandon his training in Chinese kenpo and return to Japan, where he now works as a clown. The only problem: he's not very funny.  
  
One day he meets Saiga Masaru (11), the recent inheritor of a huge fortune, who gives him the first laugh he's gotten all day. When he realizes Masaru is being pursued by assassins, he steps in to protect the boy, only to discover that instead of conventional weapons, the assassins wield huge, eerie puppets. They soon encounter the mysterious Shirogane (age unknown), who controls a puppet of her own, and claims she was sent from France by Masaru's late grandfather to protect him.  
  
Their paths intertwine and diverge, splitting into two stories: Karakuri and Circus, puppets and performers, tears and laughter. The strange circus of living dolls that spreads Zonapha Syndrome, the human puppets known collectively as the Shirogane, and the puppeteers whose undying grudge set in motion both sides of this performance.
description.es-la:
Katou Narumi (19 años) sufre el síndrome de Zonapha, una rara dolencia que le impide respirar a menos que haga reír a la gente. Se ha visto obligado a abandonar su entrenamiento en kenpo chino y a regresar a Japón, donde ahora trabaja como payaso. El único problema: no es muy divertido.  
  
Un día conoce a Saiga Masaru (11), el reciente heredero de una enorme fortuna, que le hace reír por primera vez en todo el día. Cuando se da cuenta de que Masaru es perseguido por unos asesinos, interviene para proteger al chico, sólo para descubrir que, en lugar de armas convencionales, los asesinos empuñan enormes y espeluznantes marionetas. Pronto se encuentran con la misteriosa Shirogane (de edad desconocida), que controla una marioneta propia y afirma que fue enviada desde Francia por el difunto abuelo de Masaru para protegerlo.  
  
Sus caminos se entrelazan y divergen, dividiéndose en dos historias: Karakuri y el Circo, marionetas y artistas, lágrimas y risas. El extraño circo de muñecos vivientes que propaga el síndrome de Zonapha, las marionetas humanas conocidas colectivamente como los Shirogane, y los titiriteros cuyo rencor imperecedero puso en marcha las dos partes de este espectáculo.

title.en: Ore wa Akutou de wa Arimasen

altTitles.ja: 俺は悪党ではありません

description.en: Cain von Euclid, grandson of the First King who unified the First Continent, learns from his respected grandfather that he is destined to become the strongest villain. Being unable to kill his grandson, the grandfather takes Cain on a journey to make him strong enough to overcome his fate. For 13 years, they travel across the Second, Third, and the Fourth Continent, where Cain achieved tremendous power. Finally, Cain sets off on a lone adventure where he meets many people who influence him. Will he be able to defy destiny and avoid becoming a villain?

altTitles.th: ไบโอฮาซาร์ด วิกฤตโรงเรียนนรก

altTitles.ja: バイオハザード ～マルハワデザイア～

description.en: Chris Redfield is sent by the Bioterrorism Security Assessment Alliance (BSAA) to investigate a series of biohazard incidents occurring in Marhawa School, Asia's largest elite school in a certain country in the Far East.

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

title.en: Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari ~Dantoudai kara Hajimaru, Hime no Tensei Gyakuten Story~

altTitles.ja: ティアムーン帝国物語～断頭台から始まる、姫の転生逆転ストーリー～@COMIC

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: The Reincarnation Reversal Story of the Princess, Starting from the Guillotine

altTitles.th: บันทึกเรื่องราวจักรวรรดิเทียร์มูน จุดพลิกผันชะตากรรมของเจ้าหญิงเริ่มจากบนกิโยติน

altTitles.zh: 迪阿姆帝国物语 ～从断头台开始的、公主的转生逆转传

altTitles.zh-hk: 堤亞穆帝國物語～從斷頭台開始，公主重生後的逆轉人生～

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: Beginning from the Guillotine, a Story of a Reincarnated Princess Making a Turn Around

altTitles.vi: Biên niên sử về đế chế Tearmoon

description.en:
In the Tearmoon Empire, the disdained selfish princess Mia was sentenced to death – or at least, she was supposed to have been! Instead, she woke up as her twelve-year-old self??

To avoid the guillotine in her second life, she won't repeat her past failures… "F-For me, something of this level is an easy task!" 

Ultimate self-defense! Strongest self-awareness! Using her previously clumsy, timid princess image, she will go against fate- a once-in-a-lifetime fantasy of fixing history!
description.ja: 崩壊したティアムーン帝国で、わがまま姫と蔑まれた皇女ミーアは処刑された――はずが、目覚めた彼女は12歳の少女に逆戻り？？ 第二の人生でギロチンを回避するため、帝政の建て直しを決意する。手始めに忠義に厚い下っ端メイドと、左遷されかけた優秀な文官を味方につけ、失敗した過去をやり直す日々が始まった。けれど、ミーアの本音は「我が身の安全第一」。仇敵を遠ざけ、人脈作りに励むうちに、なぜか周囲の忖度で次々と奇跡が実現！やがて、身勝手なはずの行動は大陸全土の未来を大きく変えていくのだった……。保身上等！自己中最強！小心者の元(？)ポンコツ姫が前世の記憶を使って運命に抗う、一世一代の歴史改変ファンタジー！
description.es-la: En el Imperio Tearmoon, la despreciada princesa egoísta Mia fue sentenciada a muerte, ¡O al menos se suponía que debía serlo! ¿En cambio, ella se despertó como su yo de doce años? Para evitar la guillotina en su segunda vida, no repetirá sus fracasos pasados​​... "¡P-para mí, algo de este nivel es una tarea fácil!" ¡Última defensa personal! ¡Autoconciencia más fuerte! Usando su imagen de princesa tímida y previamente torpe, irá en contra del destino, ¡Una fantasía única en la vida de arreglar la historia!

altTitles.ja: ラブ・バレット

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
description.uk:
З початку існування людства, ті, хто ніколи не відчули кохання і зустріли неочікуваний кінець, отримували другий шанс, як Купідони, як дар від Богині Кохання.

Сьогоденні Купідони змінили свої луки і стріли на новітню зброю, але їх місія залишається такою ж: знайти підходяче кохання для їх цілей і закохати їх!

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amo, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amo sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?
description.pt-br:
O que devo fazer para me tornar uma adulta?

Akane Amou, que cresceu com seus pais proibindo qualquer tipo de entretenimento, é um pouco ruim com coisas "estimulantes", até o ponto de não conseguir assistir a uma cena de beijo em um drama. Agora que ela é estudante do ensino médio, ela quer de alguma forma superá-lo! Essas são suas intenções, mas não é tão fácil. Enquanto isso, ela se familiarizou com um filme otaku chamado Fuyumine. Será que ela será capaz de assistir um filme R15...?
